v-model:anchor.description: The panel initially displays the anchor point, or the first value of the anchors attribute if not passed
v-model:anchor.description_zh: 该面板最初显示锚点，如果未传递，则显示 anchors 属性的第一个值

anchors.description: Custom anchors which unit is px
anchors.description_zh: 自定义锚点哪个单位是 px

content-draggable.description: Whether to allow to drag panel content area
content-draggable.description_zh: 是否允许拖动面板内容区域

duration.description: Transition duration which unit is ms

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: 高程级别，选项 true false 和 0-24 级别

teleport.description: The location of the ejector layer mount

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否启用底部安全区域适配

events.name: anchor-change
events.description: Triggered after moving to an anchor
